name: Pocket Player Pro: Mega Man
summary:
This officially licensed title includes Mega Man 1-6!

Mega Man is the iconic blue bomber who has been delighting fans for over 30 years. Mega Man is one of the most popular video game franchises of all time. The Mega Man series has sold over 38 million units worldwide. With his ability to absorb the powers of his enemies, Mega Man is a force to be reckoned with.

Battle your way through challenging levels, defeat powerful bosses, and save the world from Dr. Wily's evil plans.
